Verses: 1 manadhin Yosanaigal Manushanudaiyadhu; Naavin Pradhiyuththaram Karththaraal Varum.
2 manushanudaiya Vazhigalellaam Avan Paarvaikku Suththamaanavaigal; Karththaro Aavigalai Niruththuppaarkkiraar.
3 un Seygaigalaik Karththarukku Oppuvi; Appozhudhu Un Yosanaigal Urudhippadum.
4 karththar Sagalaththaiyum Thamakkendru Padaiththaar; Theengunaalukkaaga Dhunmaarkkanaiyum Undaakkinaar.
5 manamettimaiyullavanevanum Karththarukku Aruvaruppaanavan; Kaiyode Kaikorththaalum Avan Thandanaikkuth Thappaan.
6 kirubaiyinaalum Saththiyaththinaalum Paavam Nivirththiyaagum; Karththarukku Bayappadugiradhinaal Manushar Theemaiyai Vittu Vilaguvaargal.
7 oruvanudaiya Vazhigal Karththarukkup Piriyamaayirundhaal, Avanudaiya Saththurukkalum Avanode Samaadhaanamaagumpadi Seyvaar.
8 aniyaayamaai Vandha Adhiga Varumaanaththilum, Niyaayamaai Vandha Konja Varumaaname Uththamam.
9 manushanudaiya Irudhayam Avanudaiya Vazhiyai Yosikkum; Avanudaiya Nadaigalai Urudhippaduththugiravaro Karththar.
10 raajaavin Udhadugalil Dhivviyavaakku Pirakkum; Niyaayaththil Avan Vaai Thavaraadhu.
11 sumuththiraiyaana Niraikolum Tharaasum Karththarudaiyadhu; Paiyilirukkum Niraikallellaam Avarudaiya Seyal.
12 aniyaayanseyvadhu Raajaakkalukku Aruvaruppu; Needhiyinaal Singaasanam Urudhippadum.
13 needhiyulla Udhadugal Raajaakkalukkup Piriyam; Nidhaanamaaip Pesugiravanil Raajaakkal Piriyappaduvaargal.
14 raajaavin Kobam Maranathoodharukku Samaanam; Gnaanamullavano Adhai Aatruvaan.
15 raajaavin Mugakkalaiyil Jeevan Undu; Avanudaiya Dhayai Pinmaari Peyyum Megaththaippol Irukkum.
16 ponnai Sambaadhippadhilum Gnaanaththai Sambaadhippadhu Evvalavu Uththamam! Velliyai Sambaadhippadhilum Buththiyai Sambaadhippadhu Evvalavu Menmai!
17 theemaiyai Vittu Vilaguvadhe Semmaiyaanavargalukku Samanaana Paadhai; Than Nadaiyaik Gavaniththirukkiravan Than Aaththumaavaik Kaakkiraan.
18 azhivukku Munnaanadhu Agandhai; Vizhudhalukku Munnaanadhu Manamettimai.
19 agangaarigalode Kollaip Porulaip Pangiduvadhaippaarkkilum, Sirumaiyaanavargalode Manaththaazhmaiyaayiruppadhu Nalam.
20 vivegaththudan Kaariyaththai Nadappikkiravan Nanmaiperuvaan; Karththarai Nambugiravan Baakkiyavaan.
21 irudhayaththil Gnaanamullavan Vivegiyennappaduvaan; Udhadugalin Madhuram Kalviyaip Perugappannum.
22 buththi Thannai Udaiyavargalukku Jeevaootru; Madhiyeenarin Podhanai Madhiyeename.
23 gnaaniyin Irudhayam Avan Vaaikku Arivaiyoottum; Avan Udhadugalukku Adhu Menmelum Kalviyaik Kodukkum.
24 iniya Sorkal Thenkoodupol Aaththumaavukku Madhuramum, Elumbugalukku Oushadhamumaagum.
25 manushanukku Semmaiyaaith Thondrugira Vazhiyundu; Adhin Mudivo Maranavazhigal.
26 prayaasappadugiravan Thanakkaagave Prayaasappadugiraan; Avan Vaai Adhai Avanidaththil Varundhik Ketkum.
27 peliyaalin Magan Kindividugiraan; Erigira Akkinipondradhu Avan Udhadugalil Irukkiradhu.
28 maarupaadullavan Sandaiyaik Kilappividugiraan; Kol Sollugiravan Praana Snegidharaiyum Piriththuvidugiraan.
29 kodumaiyaanavan Than Ayalaanukku Nayankaatti, Avanai Nalamallaadha Vazhiyile Nadakkappannugiraan.
30 avan Maarupaadaanavaigalai Yosikkumpadi Than Kangalai Moodi, Theemaiyai Seyyumpadi Than Udhadugalaik Kadikkiraan.
31 needhiyin Vazhiyil Undaagum Naraimayiraanadhu Magimaiyaana Kreedam.
32 balavaanaippaarkkilum Neediya Saandhamullavan Uththaman; Pattanaththaip Pidikkiravanaippaarkkilum Than Manadhai Adakkugiravan Uththaman.
33 seettu Madiyile Podappadum; Kaariyasiththiyo Karththaraal Varum.
